subject: Re: Guys
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I was using manual mode to test out the last couple tuner moduals, 
and it seems to have advantages, maybe it's the human touch element. 
They seem to be able to track it easier, same with linear mode. I was 
wondering if they can access the tube electronics easier as well. I 
should be able to dig up a tube radio around here somewhere. 

 Frank-S
